Text.Name: LeftoverMaterialBase
Text.Desc: Material scraps that can be used to lay floors or build eaves.

Text.Name: Item_WoodLeftover
Text.Desc: Leftover building material mixed with wood offcuts. Can be used to lay floors or build eaves.

Text.Desc: Leftover building material mixed with Goldwood offcuts. Can be used to lay floors or build eaves.
